escape

Wordnik chrome extension

Hacked up a small chrome extension that lets you search the all powerful Wordnik API. If you wish to fork then please do so » wordnik-chrome-extension, please be aware that you WILL REQUIRE AN API KEY from Wordnik. You can easily sign up at http://developer.wordnik.com

Have fun !

Special thanks to Zeke Sikelianos for the inspiration and wordnik documentation, because if all fails, READ THE MANUAL ! o.O
